name: Up to you.
description:
This is a game about guiding the ship through treacherous waters, but you can only do morse code. Made for the GMTK game jam in about 20 hours.

Used assets: 
  • "CandyLand" tileset by MadLab
    https://opengameart.org/content/8x8-platformer-tileset-candy-land
  • Title screen music: "Rising Hopes" by Ville Nousiainen http://soundcloud.com/mutkanto
  • Audio from Kenney.nl
    https://kenney.nl/assets?q=audio
  • Font: "7:12" by Christian Munk (CMunk)
    https://fontstruct.com/fontstructions/show/243645/7_12_serif
